get.description: Lists the billingSpecs for the specified subscription and location.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the usages for the specified location.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

LocationParameter.description: The Azure location (region) for which to make the request.
LocationParameter.name: location

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

unit.description: The unit of meter, VMHours or CoreHours.

BillingResponseListResult.description: The response for the operation to get regional billingSpecs for a subscription.

billingResources.description: The billing and managed disk billing resources for a region.

vmSizeFilters.description: The virtual machine filtering mode. Effectively this can enabling or disabling the virtual machine sizes in a particular set.

vmSizes.description: The virtual machine sizes to include or exclude.

sku.description: The managed disk billing sku, P30 or S30.

tier.description: The managed disk billing tier, Standard or Premium.

LocalizedName.description: The details about the localizable name of a type of usage.

localizedValue.description: The localized name of the used resource.

value.description: The name of the used resource.

Usage.description: The details about the usage of a particular limited resource.

unit.description: The type of measurement for usage.

UsagesListResult.description: The response for the operation to get regional usages for a subscription.

VmSizeCompatibilityFilterV2.description: This class represent a single filter object that defines a multidimensional set. The dimensions of this set are Regions, ClusterFlavors, NodeTypes and ClusterVersions. The constraint should be defined based on the following: FilterMode (Exclude vs Include), VMSizes (the vm sizes in affect of exclusion/inclusion) and the ordering of the Filters. Later filters override previous settings if conflicted.

clusterFlavors.description: The list of cluster flavors under the effect of the filter.

clusterVersions.description: The list of cluster versions affected in Major.Minor format.

filterMode.description: The filtering mode. Effectively this can enabling or disabling the VM sizes in a particular set.

nodeTypes.description: The list of node types affected by the filter.

osType.description: The OSType affected, Windows or Linux.

regions.description: The list of regions under the effect of the filter.

vmSizes.description: The list of virtual machine sizes to include or exclude.
